member.summary: Returns a blurry bitmap by the factor of the specified value. Can not be higher than width.

member.name: M:Toecramp_Engine.engine.effects.filmgrain(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Grains the frame. The factor is how often a grain is added to the frame. Factor 1 means one grain, or 1 pixel.
